post_content:
Price is net to me and delivered. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or negotiations. 

PSA 2 Neal Ball New York $140. A tough common (check eBay). This card is insanely nice. I assume the reason for the grade is the ever so small pulls on the upper and left borders on the back. Great corners. Fabulous 150 series image and color. 

Thanks for looking!

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52509705748_699249991f_c_d.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52509434589_4fb9e0b748_c_d.jpg[/IMG]
